entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall stood up and her beady eyes swept the room.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Twice they passed right over the place where Harry and Luna stood.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Twice they passed right over the place where Harry and Luna stood.

entities.name: amykus
entities.description: said Amycus, his piglike face suddenly crafty.

entities.name: alecto
entities.description: we’ll say Alecto was ambushed by the kids,

relationships.description: we’ll say Alecto was ambushed by the kids,
we’ll say they forced her to press the Mark, and that’s why he got a false alarm.
